actions.text: Reported by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 102-913.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 212.
Ms. Norton moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: To designate the United States Court of Appeals Building located at 125 South Grand Avenue in Pasadena, California, as the "Richard H. Chambers United States Court of Appeals Building".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. Court of Appeals building located at 125 South Grand Avenue, Pasadena, California, as the Richard H. Chambers United States Court of Appeals Building.

titles.title: To designate the United States Court of Appeals Building located at 125 South Grand Avenue in Pasadena, California, as the "Richard H. Chambers United States Court of Appeals Building".
